segments.text: Now I'm focusing on the center-left area, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy climbing on a two-step stool in front of the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry it's going to tip backward at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched upward, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a large jar labeled 'COOKIE JAR' inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, presumably for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, looking up at him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, almost asking for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me feel quite nervous for the boy's safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really take a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR
